name: chrome-download-quicklook-extension
description: ðŸ’¾ðŸ”­ A beautiful Chrome extension to have a quicklook on your downloads !

scripts.dev: concurrently -r "mkdir -p dist/material-icons" "cp -R node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/* dist/material-icons" "NODE_PATH=src watchify src/index.js -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -g yo-yoify" "watchify src/background.js -o dist/background.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -g yo-yoify"
scripts.build: concurrently -r "mkdir -p dist/material-icons" "cp -R node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/* dist/material-icons" "NODE_PATH=src browserify src/index.js -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -g yo-yoify -g uglifyify" "browserify src/background.js -o dist/background.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -g yo-yoify -g uglifyify"

author: thcolin
